participant_1.background:
I'm looking for ways to control my blood sugar while still being able to enjoy my active lifestyle.
I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.
I put my children to bed.
i have two tattoos.
i can knit.

participant_2.background:
I've been in my current relationship for five years, and it's the longest I've ever been with someone.
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
i enjoy eating italian food.
i shop online a lot.
I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

content.text: Good, just got back from putting my children to bed.
Nice! I'm in a relationship with my husband going on 5 years. We dress up and go to comic cons together. What do you like to do for fun?
I knit, which is a form of art. I also enjoy going on walks to get some exercise.
I used to knit when I was a kid. I also like to shop online a lot. I am a stay at home mom and work with my parents.
That is cool. I used to race go karts until I tore my ACL. I have two tattoos and I enjoy Italian food.
I've been to a couple comic cons but have never raced go karts. I've been thinking of getting a tattoo for a while now but haven't pulled the trigger yet.
Go for it! Tattoos are a lot of fun. Italian food is delicious too. I love cooking.
I've been trying to learn to cook more. What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta. I love Italian food.
I love pasta too! I make a mean spaghetti bolognese.
